Dear Applicant,
Re: {{ business.legalName }} ({{ business.identifier }})
{{ business.legalName }} ({{ business.identifier }}) was authorized on {{effective_date}} to amalgamate with one or more foreign corporations to form an amalgamated foreign corporation in {{ jurisdiction }}.
This authorization expires on {{ cco_expiry_date }}.
Section 286(1) states that "the amalgamated foreign corporation must promptly file with the registrar a copy of any record issued to the amalgamated foreign corporation by the amalgamated foreign corporation's jurisdiction to effect or confirm the amalgamation."
Our office must receive this copy of the amalgamation record in order to make the company historical in B.C.

Yours truly,
